comments:
When validating an extension the following exception may occur due to problems 
with the relevant schema. It would be much better if somewhere (ideally an 
entry in the problems view) the offending file was identified.

It's been over a year since I submitted this one. Is anyone listening?
it would help if you provided a schema that demonstrates the problem.
All IO Exceptions during schema loading are now logged.
